pr_title: Fix class loading issue for augment class loader

timeline.message: Fix class loading issue for augment class loader

Make sure the deployment always ends up in the correct CL

Fixes #8920

Make sure the deployment always ends up in the correct CL

Fixes #8920

timeline.bodyText: what's the idea behind this change?
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: If there are two paths, then the second time only one gets added, as they both have the same map key.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText: oh, i missed that. that's not good.
replies.author: aloubyansky
